  • #Integrations
  • #Blockchain
Development time:
3 months
Stack:
Vue.js, Nuxt.js, GraphQL, web3.js, Solidity.
Description:
Metaverse NFT project with OpenSea integration. Here users can buy a piece of the virtual Earth and insert a picture into it. Also, the user can merge pieces of the Earth nearby to increase the available area for the picture or insert another one.

The project used many different integrations and technologies, such as SPA, Smart Contracts and 5 popular crypto wallets

Millionpieces

  • #NFT
  • #Design
Development time:
3 weeks
Stack:
React.js, Express.js, ImmutableX
Description:
Puzzle themed NFT project. The project has a lot of beautiful and smooth animations that improve the user experience while on the site. We used the Immutable X blockchain, popular among NFT projects, known for its extremely low gas price.

Puzzle People.

  • #Web
  • #back-end
Development time:
2 months
Stack:
Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js
Description:
A platform built for the US internet fax leader. The project uses a lot of modern technologies, such as SPA elements and complex server calculations. A customized administrative panel was created to control and add subscriptions/products.

SipSignal

  • #Web
  • #eCommerce
Development time:
3 weeks
Stack:
Wordpress, WooCommerce, PHP, MySQL
Description:
Website-showcase for Rauberg, a popular manufacturer of household appliances in Russia. The project used a lot of interesting animations, and also created and set up a purchase function directly on the site.
